item.title: [RBX8][Network] - SNC Network equpement Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 13:00 - 14:00 UTC

Oct 10, 21:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC
Service impact : For SNC customers who have not correctly configured the two active IPsec VPNs on two different VPNGWs, there will be an interruption of IP traffic between the SNC site and the customer site through the IPsec tunnel for the duration of the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

item.title: [SBG3][Infrastructure] - Electrical work
item.description:
Oct 12, 17:30 UTC
Completed - The UPS has been fixed by one of our provider.
The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Oct 12, 15:17 UTC
Update - One of our Uninterruptible Power Supply electrical works is experiencing difficulties, servers may experience short disturbances in the event of a voltage change. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Oct 12, 06:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 5, 21:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/10/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 13/10/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : There may be several power supply sources swapping during maintenance.
Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to carry out a preventive maintenance of the UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply, a device placed in series with the supply of power from the utility which contains energy storage such that the supply of power from the UPS is continuous even when the utility supply is removed) .
